summary: An adaptation of RonnieMagnum's mod which replaces Volendrung models and textures but keep its Vanilla stats untouched.
descriptionHtml:
[b][center][/center][/b][center][u]Original mod:[/u]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48906]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48906[/url]ï»¿

[u]Credits to:[/u]
RonnieMagnum for his meshes and textures.

[u]Description:[/u]
I'm not a fan of Volendrung appearence and I was positively impressed by RonnieMagnum's replacer, but I wanted to keep its Vanilla stats for a lore friendly experience: I just tweaked his file in order to replace only Volendrung's look leaving its damage and enchantment untouched.

[u]Installation:[/u]
Drop Meshes and Textures folders in your Data folder, allow merging when required.[/center]
author: Giizis
